name: Afterdream & DISTRAINT Series Bundle
description:
Afterdream & DISTRAINT Series Bundle includes:
Get ready to escape from the real world and find unseen humanity in this unreasonable, irrational, and impossible dream. Same Developer, Lower Bundle Price. This collection of quality psychological horror games will promise you immersive and terrifying adventures.
DISTRAINT: Deluxe Edition DISTRAINT is a 2D psychological horror adventure game for PC. In order to secure a partnership in a famous company, Price seizes the property of an elderly woman. In that very moment, he finds out the price of his humanity. DISTRAINT 2 You are Price, a man who sold his humanity to get a partnership from a leading company: McDade, Bruton & Moore. DISTRAINT 2 follows on from the events of the first game. It's a sinister tale about restoring hope and finding your purpose. DISTRAINT 2 - OST Composed by Jesse Makkonen, the DISTRAINT 2 OST features beautifully haunting and just plain weird and playful original songs. Afterdream Get lost in a lucid dream, bending the lines between reality and fiction. Utilize the strange camera to navigate through the ghosts' mysterious residence. Find the purpose of your nocturnal visit in a vivid and dreamlike setting.

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
